comment: Took him online for intro to software engineering. VERY easy class as long as you don't miss assignments. There is 1 group project which is a small amount of work spread among many people. The tests aren't difficult either. The only issue I had was sometimes the instructions weren't clear enough, however he is accessible through email.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--Group projects

comment: Great professor, will work with you as a student to make sure you understand the content.
SUMMER ONLINE. Group project was basically the entire semester. Easy grader with simple tasks. Two test, rather difficult (mainly the Final). Not sure how difficult his In class lectures will be.
